meanings.definition: Capable of being shaped or molded by heat.
meanings.sent1: The thermoformable plastic became soft and pliable when heated.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a thermoformable material to create a unique sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The thermoformable clay decided to take a hot bath to relax and reshape itself.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as thermoformable as clay, easily molded into new shapes.
meanings.sent5: The thermoformable fabric transformed under the iron's heat, adapting to the design.

meanings.definition: Able to be formed or reshaped using heat.
meanings.sent1: When heated, the thermoformable material could be easily reshaped.
meanings.sent2: The thermoformable plastic sheet could be molded into various shapes.
meanings.sent3: The thermoformable cookie dough decided to change its shape in the oven.
meanings.sent4: His mind was as thermoformable as wax, ready to adapt to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The thermoformable material responded well to the heat gun, allowing for precise adjustments.

meanings.definition: Suitable for forming or molding with heat.
meanings.sent1: The thermoformable material was perfect for creating custom designs.
meanings.sent2: The thermoformable substance could be easily shaped when warmed.
meanings.sent3: The thermoformable chocolate decided to melt and take on a new form.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was as thermoformable as clay, ready to be molded by love.
meanings.sent5: The thermoformable plastic sheet was ideal for crafting intricate details with heat.
